players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I have no information to share at this time."
Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of Diana? That seems like an odd choice for Night 1."

Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice investigated me instead of Diana on Night 1. It's possible she made a mistake or was trying to misdirect us. I have no concrete evidence to share at this moment, but I will keep an open mind and consider all possibilities..."

Bob: "Alice, if you're the detective, why reveal your investigation result immediately? That puts a target on your back. Charlie, your silence is suspicious. We need to discuss this carefully before voting."

You: "I investigated Charlie because I suspected him, and I was right. Bob, revealing immediately ensures we act fast before mafia misleads us. Charlie's silence and deflection confirm guilt. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested
